Comments.Message:
I will need to know a few things, then (since I don't have either item):

What is the proc-rate outside the internal cooldown of Darkmoon Card: Blue Dragon
Is there even an internal cooldown on Darkmoon Card: Blue Dragon? (Can it proc while you still have the buff?)

Wowhead suggests Bangle of Endless Blessings has a 10% proc-rate and a 45 second internal cooldown - is this accurate?

--

The items should be easy enough to model on their own. The hard thing is removing the mp5 that the bangle gives while the darkmoon card has already proced.

Tree development version:
Darkmoon Card: Blue Dragon - Implemented as 2% proc-rate with no proc while a proc is still active
Bangle of Endless Blessings - Proc implemented as 10% proc-rate with 45 seconds cooldown
Bangle of Endless Blessings - On-Use effect as an "average" mana-regen gain (the effect will thus be active "1/6" of the time during Innervate regardless if your innervate is capped by max mana or not (it probably is capped by mana anyway))

If both Blue Dragon and the Bangle are used, the bangle assumes it never procs at the same time as the blue dragon (which means the mp5 it gives is ~25% higher than it should be).

I also added the Lower City Prayerbook, which is a bit more reliable than bangle for druids (and better, at least with high-end gear).
On-Use effects that add +healing were added as average healing (same as the hyjal exalted ring), and a scaling factor (default 0.8) was added for those who don't like temporary healing.

Implemented in 2.0.0

** Closed by TNSe 10/14/2008 9:26 AM

I implemented Darkmoon card: Blue Dragon for HolyPriest as a 2% chance to proc 100% mana regeneration for 15 seconds without any cooldown.
Bangle was implemented as 15% chance to proc 15% mana regeneration for 15 seconds with a 45second cooldown.

Simple implementation is:
Bangle: Mana Regen increase = 15% * 15 / 60 = 3.75% (Meditation 3/3 is 30%)
Blue Dragon: Mana Regen increase = (100% - Meditation) * 15 s/ (100%/2%*2.5s) = 8.4% with 30% meditation

This is a very simplified model of these trinkets, but in average it should be "good enough."
